title: Liberating Your Teen to Make Decisions
itunes:author: Michael Anderson & Dr. Timothy Johanson
itunes:summary:
Micromanaging can be a difficult habit to break. John and Danny offer advice to free you from nagging your teen. Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


GIST: The Essence of Raising Life-Ready Kids: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/singleitem/checkout/donation/item/don-fofp-podcast-2020-09-01#refcd=1007506

Get More Episode Resources: https://focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/liberating-your-teen-to-make-decisions/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
